name: Alistair Walsh
body:
![](http://i.imgur.com/6h8UwY0.jpg)

- BSc. Cognitive Neuroscience (Hon.) Swinburne University of Technology
- Rescom ResearchPlatforms@Unimelb
- Software Carpentry Trainer

My main area of research is Neuro-feedback and Brain-Computer interfaces. I do hardware, software and analysis of brain activity data. My main programming language is Python, I also use R, C++, Javascript/HTML/CSS
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
